channel.title: Summer School on STRaDe
channel.description: Recent content in Summer School on STRaDe

item.title: Our Members at Summer School of Biometry
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> Martin Sakin and Jan Tinka spent a week at a biometry summer school organized by professor Massimo Tistarelli in Alghero in Sardinia, where they attended lectures and took part in discussions on topics ranging from person recognition based on iris to recognition based on gait patterns. The main topic of this yearâ€™s summer school was not only biometry but also application of deep learning methods and other machine learning for biometric purposes.
